resources.string:
Gaze is an hybrid game : a mix between a video game and a board game. The goal is to find anamorphic shapes on a physical board. Once you find a shape you validate it by taking a picture, the game will recognize if it is the right shape.
 
Gaze was designed to be a multiplayer game, but if you are alone you can still play. Application will propose you 3 shapes : an easy, a medium and a hard. You will have to chose one of them. The more difficult a shape is announced, the more difficult it is to be found, but it will give you more points.
 
Now it"s up to you : find it on the board, and validate it by taking a picture.
 
The first player who find 4 shapes make the game stop, and the player who have the most of points win !
Press back again to quit Gaze
You will need your camera to validate your finds :)
The permission is required to play
